attributes.action: consider how the proposed ID cards may be used to reduce litter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For example, a chocolate wrapper or crisps bag would have on it a bar code which includes a unique serial number. When a purchase is made the buyer's ID card is also scanned at the same time. If the chocolate wrapper or crisp bag is subsequently found discarded in the street it will be scanned to show who bought it and that person will be sent a £60 litter fine.
